about_the_game:
Get ready for an epic showdown! From the producers at Game Duchy comes the highly anticipated addition to the Iron Saga series - "Iron Saga VS," soon arriving on Steam!

·Multiple Powerful Mecha Participate in The Battle

The first iconic roster of combat units include:

"Mazinger Z" series - [Mazinger Z], [Great Mazinger] and [Boss Robot]

"Shin Getter Robo" series - [Getter Robo]

"Dancouga – Super Beast Machine God" - [Dancouga]

"Iron Saga" series - [Kaguya], [Qing Long], [Mephisto], [Susanoo], [Nero], [Vassago] and [Wushuang]

·Nostalgic Classic Battle Scenes

This game features iconic 2D fighting scenes, assuring top-notch game quality while delivering seamless graphics and action design. For fighting scenes, players can explore various styles, including classic battle scenes intertwined with collaborative narratives such as [Photon Power Research Institute] and [Saotome Research Institute].

·Dynamic Combat System

Iron Saga VS equips each mecha with an assortment of weapons and a variety of resource systems. Players are granted the freedom to tactically manage resources and combine skills as they engage in battles using their unique styles.

To guarantee character balance and elevate competitive excitement, our game has been fine-tuned with the expertise of pro-fighting players to ensure you enjoy an exceptional combat experience.

•Unique Arsenal Systems

In this game, each mecha is equipped with multiple independent arsenals, each with unique characteristics. Players can select their arsenal set before battle, and the mecha will take on that form, gaining exclusive moves associated with the selected arsenal.

·Anthropomorphic AI System

In order to bring players a better single-player gaming experience, Iron Saga VS features an exclusive "anthropomorphic" AI system.

Every AI mecha comes with its own set of tactics and gameplay styles, enriching the strategic depth of battles.

·Global Online Matches

This game applies "Rollback Network Code" to enhance players' gaming experience and ensure superior online gameplay quality.

In battle rooms, players will embody cute virtual avatars and compete with other pilots. Players can also participate in ranked matches to earn points and showcase their strength with higher ranks and scores!
